document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

Biology. Grasslands. Adults occur in IV–VIII. On Malvaceae :
Malva silvestris
,
M. pusilla
,
Althaea officinalis
,
Lavatera arborea
